iti7:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti7:2.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding the all, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
iti7:2.2: By directly knowing and completely understanding the all, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
iti7:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
iti7:3.1: “Those who know the all as all,
iti7:3.4: and have risen above all suffering.”
iti7:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
